resources.string: Behind That Looked Door: Beatles Rarities

In a vault deep inside Abbey Road Studios in London - pro For more information, see the Beatles Time Capsule a www.rockument.com 

 This volume starts with the first new Beatle song, "Free as a Bird" (Based on a John Lennon) 

 Highlights include : 

 Cry for a Shadow - Many a Beatle fanatic started down the bootleg road, like 

 My Bonie and Ain;t She Swet - At the same session 

 Searchin - A Jerry Leiber- Mike Stoller comedy song that was a hit for the 

 Love Me Do - An early version of the song, played a bit slowler and with 

 She Loves You - Till There Was You - Twist and Shout - Live at the Princess 

 Leave My Kitten Alone - One of the lost Beatle songs recorded during the 

 One After 989 - A song recorded for theLet It Be album was actually
